      • computeSplitSize

        public long computeSplitSize(long blockSize,
                    long minSize,
                    long maxSize)
        This input format overrides computeSplitSize() to make sure that each split only contains full records. Each InputSplit passed to FixedLengthBinaryRecordReader will start at the first byte of a record, and the last byte will the last byte of a record.
        Overrides:
        computeSplitSize in class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>

      • createRecordReader

        Create a FixedLengthBinaryRecordReader
        Specified by:
